pageContext.category: Everett D. Graff Collection of Western Americana; U.S. Western Expansion; Letters (Correspondence)

pages.transcription:
New _____
July 10th 1827
R. M. Sherman Esq.
My dear Sir.
A   please 
find a Memorandum of Some articles
(tools) which are acquired by Capt. Sutter. in building a Saw Mill - 
should you see fit to fill the bill
at ___ us  for as you have the articles in your store. I 
will hold myself responsible for the Payment.
Since my source at this place I have been     engaged in making the neccessary preparations for my trip aboard(abroad?) - shall leave in about eight days
Please inform me if you can ____ wheat on account I have

On my leaving Francisco I left my shaving apparatus in one of the table drawers in Capt Grimes room. Please do me the favor to wrap them up carefully and unclearl them to care of Capt Sutter. Send them in charge of Keesburg? Capt of the Launch.  I am very truly signature. 
check list 1 Brace? unclear, 1 foot adze, 1 patent square, 1 jack plane, 1 smoothing plane, 1 - 1 inch firmer chisel, 1  - 1 1/2 ditto marks, 1 - 2 ditto marks
2 hand saws, 1 set of augers, 1 - 1 inch sickel? chisel, 1 -  1 1/2 inch ditto marks,  1- 2 inch ditto marks
Same signature

J. B. Reading, New Helvetia, July 10, 1847
R. M Sherman, San Francisco, Launch 3
unclear C. Richard Sherman
